name: Circle of the Shepherd
description: Druids who call on animal and fey spirits to protect their charges.

2.name: Speech of the Woods
2.description: Learn Sylvan and communicate with beasts; they can understand you and you can interpret their noises.

2.name: Spirit Totem
2.description: As a bonus action, summon an aura-creating spirit (bear, hawk or unicorn) for 1 minute, usable once per short rest.

6.name: Mighty Summoner
6.description: Beasts and fey you summon have 2 extra hit points per Hit Die and their attacks count as magical.

10.name: Guardian Spirit
10.description: Creatures you summoned regain hit points equal to half your druid level when they end their turn in your Spirit Totem aura.

14.name: Faithful Summons
14.description: If reduced to 0 hit points or incapacitated, automatically cast conjure animals at 9th level to summon protective beasts.
